name: debug-wrapup
description: A command intended to be used as wrapup for debug-with-setup-wrapup
command-line: /bin/sh -c 'echo Beginning wrapup; echo ls -R /input; ls -R /input; cp /input/setup-was-here /output; cp /input/main-was-here /output; touch /output/wrapup-was-here; echo Wrapup complete'
